## Primary Purpose
Package metadata definition file for the requests library, containing version information and package constants used for distribution and identification.

- `__description__` (L6): Human-readable package description

- `__author_email__` (L11): Author contact information
- `__license__` (L12): Apache-2.0 license identifier
- `__copyright__` (L13): Copyright notice
- `__cake__` (L14): Unicode emoji string (decorative element)

## Architecture Notes
Standard Python package metadata pattern following PEP conventions. Variables prefixed with double underscores indicate special module-level metadata that can be imported and used by setup tools, package managers, and runtime introspection.

## Usage Context
Typically imported by `__init__.py` or setup configuration to expose package metadata to consumers and distribution tools.
